samples.label: short
samples.transcript: The kubernetes cluster ran three pods on each node.

samples.label: medium
samples.transcript: The webhook endpoint returned a four hundred error because the payload exceeded the maximum size limit for JSON serialization.

samples.label: long
samples.transcript: After deploying the micro services to production we noticed that the gRPC connections were timing out. The root cause was a misconfigured load balancer that did not support HTTP two multiplexing.

samples.label: jfk
samples.transcript: And so my fellow Americans ask not what your country can do for you ask what you can do for your country.
